description: Defines a React functional component 'ConfirmDialog' that displays a modal dialog with customizable title, message, and actions. It handles keyboard events for 'Escape' to cancel, and manages modal visibility and styling.

methods.name: ConfirmDialog
methods.description: React functional component rendering a confirmation dialog modal with props: open, title, message, onCancel, onConfirm.

ctags.name: ConfirmDialog
ctags.pattern: /^const ConfirmDialog = ({ open, title = 'Confirm', message = 'Are you sure?', onCancel = () => {}/

ctags.name: open
ctags.pattern: /^const ConfirmDialog = ({ open, title = 'Confirm', message = 'Are you sure?', onCancel = () => {}/
